tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MusicTherapyTechniques (
  technique_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_name VARCHAR(50),
  technique_description TEXT,
  therapeutic_goal VARCHAR(100),
  exercises JSONB,
  recommended_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_exercises (
    exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exercise_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    exercise_description TEXT,
    technique_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES music_therapy_techniques(technique_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Techniques (technique_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 technique_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Exercises (exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 exercise_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 duration_minutes INT,
 technique_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES Techniques(technique_id));

CREATE TABLE Activities (activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 type VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT,
 created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 treatment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 technique_id INT,
 activity_id INT,
 created_at TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES Techniques(technique_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES Activities(activity_id));

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
